strings.description: A bard who made her living singing of legends and heroes. Liza's beautiful voice, and the graceful playing of her harp, served to comfort and inspire the common folk. Eventually, however, she drew the ire of a beast whose acts she had recounted in song, and lost her voice to a curse it placed on her. Bereft of her true gift and livelihood, Liza vanished, never to be seen again.
strings.fusion:
There's a song on my lips...
I think my voice got stronger!
I want to share this refrain with everyone!
strings.summon:
Huh? Have I...come back to life?
A vision? A summoning, you say?
Well, I guess I don't really mind as long as I can siiing! ♫

strings.evolution:
This power is strange...
It's as if it were awakening me.
Yes, this is a song from the soul!
I'll play a tune on the harp to celebrate!
strings.affinity:
How long we've traveled together.
I do hope you've found my singing useful, ha ha. Let's keep looking after each other!
strings.description: A beautiful bard who earned her daily bread traveling the world, singing of legendary beasts and the heroes who vanquished them. Liza fell into deep despair after losing her voice to the curse of a vengeful creature of whom she had sung, and cast her life away by drowning herself in a lake. Though she died full of regrets, as a vision she can once again sing to her heart's content.
strings.fusion:
A song springs from deep within my heart.
My soul aches to sing to the people!
My melodies have taken on new powers!
strings.summon:
So you were the one who summoned me!
I can sing again... I'm so happy!
I'm sure my songs will be of help!
